application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Variation of conditions 2 (Approved plans), 14 & 15 (Proposed road improvements & pedestrian paths) & 17 (Travel plan) to allow for changes to height/design of consented football pavilion, re-location of approved football AGP, replacement of one approved football AGP with a hockey AGP, creation of two new netball courts, alterations to football pavilion car park and to hockey car park, to accommodate a 12m coach with increase in car parking spaces from 71 to 78, minor changes to roadway/footpath improvement timescales, & change from Travel Plan being required pre-commencement to pre-occupation of Parcels A, C and D, of planning permission 00503/B/S1 dated 18/04/18 for partial redevelopment of Dukes Meadows playing fields & site of Thames Tradesmen's Clubhouse within wider Dukes Meadows involving: demo of various structures within curtilage of rugby clubhouse together with demo of existing rowing clubhouse and demolition of redundant public toilets on The Promenade; retention accessibility improvements to existing bandstand; erection of a new single storey football clubhouse on playing fields comprising team changing rooms & social/coaching spaces, extension to existing rugby club comprising additional team changing rooms for both rugby & hockey together with an attendant first floor rugby groundsman's dwelling, erection of a replacement two storey rowing clubhouse comprising new boat storage, changing & social spaces with a ground floor cafe. New replacement public toilets on The Promenade. Associated external works comprising reconfigured natural grass pitches for football & rugby, floodlit & fenced artificial grass pitches for football & floodlit, partially enclosed, rugby artificial grass pitch & ancillary car parking/access improvements, wider public realm works within Dukes Meadows along Dan Mason Drive, The Promenade, Riverside Drive & Promenade Approach Road; highways & access improvements, cycle & car parking, signage, lighting hard & soft landscape works
